proofDetails.en: Supported a high level Distributed Software Systems course as a teaching assistant.

role.en: Undergraduate Teaching Assistant for Distributed Software Systems course

summary.en: Designed and coded an assignment; a “Wheel of Fortune” Java server supporting a dynamic amount of concurrent clients. Mentored students in designing distributed systems hosted on AWS and debugging client-server architectures.

en: Actively answered student questions on Slack discussion boards, and hosted office hours once per week.
Assisted in debugging complex issues with code logic, networking, threading, AWS deployment, Ubuntu, and virtualization.
